content.description:
Primus ibi ante omnes magna comitante caterva

Laocoon ardens summa decurrit ab arce,

et procul "O miseri, quae tanta insania, cives?

Creditis avectos hostes? Aut ulla putatis

(5) dona carere dolis Danaum? Sic notus Ulixes?

Aut hoc inclusi ligno occultantur Achivi,

aut haec in nostros fabricata est machina muros."

Aeneid 2.40-46

Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.
content.question: Name a stylistic device that occurs in line 6 (Aut . . . Achivi). Write out the specific Latin word or words that illustrate that figure.

frqParts.text: Name a stylistic device that occurs in line 6 (Aut . . . Achivi). Write out the specific Latin word or words that illustrate that figure.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.A: Describe features and functions of stylistic elements in Latin texts.
